Reviews.Title: the palm phone
Reviews.Author: alma men
Reviews.Content: sorry but with in two weeks I couldn't go to my Facebook automatically and having problems with the EV ON TOP

Reviews.Title: Palm Pre Review
Reviews.Author: Ruby Diaz
Reviews.Content: This phone is a really good phone. Its quick, its easy to understand, and it does its job as a phone. I'm speaking from previous experience, but i gave the phone i received a four star because, unfortunately, there was a small crack on the screen and a few scratches( no biggie, I guess). It still works perfectly, it still serves its primary function as a phone, and its palm sized! This phone also has a sliding feature, so when you slide it up you have a keypad. This phone is still awesome =]

Reviews.Title: WON'T DO IT AGAIN!!!
Reviews.Author: WON'T DO IT AGAIN!!!
Reviews.Content: WITHIN 4 DAYS OF HAVING THE PHONE THE "TOUCH" SCREEN QUIT WORKING!!! NOT TO MENTION I PAID 3 DAY SHIPPING AND RECEIVED IT IN 2 WEEKS!!! I WOULDN'T BUY FROM HERE AGAIN...BUYER BEWARE!!!

Reviews.Title: Headset Mode is forever
Reviews.Author: Devon
Reviews.Content: Once you use a headset or headphones with this phone, it's extremely likely that you will be stuck in that mode even when the headset is removed.
